channel.title: [Riotscape]Problems -.-
channel.description:
1. My ItemonItem doesn't work anymore, it was fine yesterday before I added Crafting to go alone with the Herblore.
2. I added starters on login, but it gives them EVERY time you login, how do I fix that?
3. Everytime I login, the melee prayer shows up, how can I make it so there are no headIcons up when you login?
4. Hats and helmets are glitched, see this thread (http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,424309.0.html)
5. [IMG]http://img62.imageshack.us/img62/4548/zdhg.jpg[/img]

item.title: [Riotscape]Problems -.-
item.dc:creator: @iTanq iTanq
item.description:
@iTanq wrote:

[quote=“Zanzibar, post:2, topic:328018”]1. Look at the codes you added. See if anything will mess up itemonitem.

  1. Make an int in player.java ; in the starter code make it add +1 to the int you declared in player.java . Check if the int is 0, if so add +1 to the int and give starter pack. If int is >1, then don’t do anything.

  2. :S Idk

  3. Use the client that was for the source, if provided.

  4. The sendQuest # thing is wrong ?[/quote]

  5. Fixed.

  6. Working at it.

  7. Fixed.

  8. That client is a piece of shit, and I wanted the 377 gameframe, which I have no idea how to change.

  9. Meaning?

Read full topic

item.title: [Riotscape]Problems -.-
item.dc:creator: @Zanzibar Zanzibar
item.description:
@Zanzibar wrote:

  1. Look at the codes you added. See if anything will mess up itemonitem.

  2. Make an int in player.java ; in the starter code make it add +1 to the int you declared in player.java . Check if the int is 0, if so add +1 to the int and give starter pack. If int is >1, then don’t do anything.

  3. :S Idk

  4. Use the client that was for the source, if provided.

  5. The sendQuest # thing is wrong ?

Read full topic
